name: Comprehensive Literacy Development
objective: The objective of the Comprehensive Literacy Development program is to advance literacy skills, including pre-literacy skills, reading and writing for students from birth through grade 12, including English learner and students with disabilities.
sub_agency_name: Office of Elementary and Secondary Education
applicant_types: Local (includes State-designated Indian Tribes, excludes institutions of higher education and hospitals

results.description: No Current Data Available. No Current Data Available.

authorizations.text: II, B, Subpart 2, 2222, Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965, as amended.

rules_regulations: Education Department General Administrative Regulations (EDGAR), 34 CFR Parts 74, 75, 76, 77,79,80,81,82,85,86,97,98,and 99.  Contact the program office for additional information.
